mapper.select:
select data_id, classify_id, classify_name, parent_id, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, modify_user_disp, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user from zjk_skm_type where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and classify_id like '%${classifyId}%'
and classify_name like '%${classifyName}%'
and parent_id like '%${parentId}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
